definitions.definition: Synonym of tandemize ( “( transitive ) to harness or drive ( two draught animals , generally draught horses ) one behind the other; to set up (two or more things , such as pieces or equipment ) to work in tandem or together ; ( intransitive ) to drive a tandem (‘ carriage pulled by two or more draught animals (generally draught horses) harnessed one behind the other’)” )

main_definition: ( ambitransitive ) Synonym of tandemize ( “( transitive ) to harness or drive ( two draught animals , generally draught horses ) one behind the other; to set up (two or more things , such as pieces or equipment ) to work in tandem or together ; ( intransitive ) to drive a tandem (‘ carriage pulled by two or more draught animals (generally draught horses) harnessed one behind the other’)” )
